The influential Japanese midfielder, who has been stalling on signing a contract extension, made his comeback from injury with a 30-minute appearance as a second-half substitute in the 3-0 win over Dundee at Parkhead yesterday. Hatate has yet to start a [...]

entry.title: AS EASY AS 1,2,3 FOR NET PROPHETS
entry.summary: CELTIC staged an action replay against Dundee that went largely unnoticed at Parkhead yesterday.
